practice_phrases: Of course.
当然。
Of course you can.
当然你可以。
Of course I don't know.
当然我不知道。
Of course you think so.
当然你认为这么。
Of course it's so good.
当然它这么好。
Of course she's my friend.
当然她是我的朋友。
Of course that was a surprise.
当然那是个惊喜。
Of course I'm so happy.
当然我很高兴。
Of course I don't know why you think that.
当然我不知道为什么你认为那。
Of course there are too many ideas in my head.
当然有太多想法在我的脑海里。
You can ask her.
你可以问她。
Of course you can ask her.
当然你可以问她。
Of course you can ask her now.
当然你可以现在问她。
I think you can ask her.
我认为你可以问她。
Of course you can ask her that.
当然你可以问她那。
You can ask her because she knows.
你可以问她，因为她知道。
Of course you can ask her about it.
当然你可以问她关于它。
I don't know if you can ask her.
我不知道你可以不可以问她。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
I think you can ask her when you work together.
我认为当你们一起工作的时候你可以问她。
Because she's my friend.
因为她是我的朋友。
I know because she's my friend.
我知道，因为她是我的朋友。
Of course, because she's my friend.
当然，因为她是我的朋友。
You can ask her because she's my friend.
你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
That's not a problem because she's my friend.
那不是问题，因为她是我的朋友。
I think so because she's my friend.
我认为这么，因为她是我的朋友。
I don't know that because she's my friend.
我不知道那，因为她是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
I'm so happy because she's my friend and she's doing well.
我很高兴，因为她是我的朋友，她做得很好。
Of course I think you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然我认为你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
She's my friend.
她是我的朋友。
Of course she's my friend.
当然她是我的朋友。
I don't know she's my friend.
我不知道她是我的朋友。
You think she's my friend.
你认为她是我的朋友。
Of course I know she's my friend.
当然我知道她是我的朋友。
She's my friend and she's so good.
她是我的朋友，她这么好。
I'm so happy that she's my friend.
我很高兴她是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
I don't know why you think she's my friend.
我不知道为什么你认为她是我的朋友。
Of course she's my friend and I know her very well.
当然她是我的朋友，我非常了解她。
